Summary: Low to ground, slow moving round meteorite, brilliant white.
divs: sighting detailscheshire connecticut, i am looking for some input on a object i seen the other day. the more i think about it the stranger it gets. i am not one that hopes or wishes to see a ufo, i had witnessed a huge one some years ago and that was enough to tell me they are here. i believed i had seen a meteorite but now i am not so sure, i have seen many but this one was far different from all the others. so i will describe this the best i can. i was working outside on the morning of dec 25th at 5:26 am. this object caught my eye coming from the west to east or so i thought at the time. i was able to view it for 4 to 5 seconds before it went out of my sight behind a building not more than 100ft to 200ft off the ground. it was moving very slowly compared to other meteors i have seen before but this was also closer than any i had witnessed, much closer. the best way to describe it i think would be to say it was half the size of a basketball. it was white and round, i mean pure white and perfectly round. odd. like a perfect white, beautiful. it had two trails of sparks that were seen clearly coming off the top and bottom of the object trailing behind it coming closer to one another the farther back they went. i was able to talk to a fellow security officer who was 1\4 mile to my north who seen the object also. this person said it came from the north west and past over his vehicle and he lost sight of it while he tried to turn the vehicle around. i forgot to mention it was descending, i really cant say how high it was when i first seen it but it was not on a very sharp angle. i would say about 12 15 degrees but this is only my best guess. what really got me thinking about this was the shape and speed. it just all seems a little odd. i would have loved to chase it down but i was unable to get relieved from my post to investigate. i half expected to hear fire trucks but never did. well no matter what it was, it was a special treat on a special morning. i decided to repost this event here after finding this post elsewhere. vineland ��� on december 26, 2006, my mother and i were about two minutes away from my house when she saw a very bright ball, white in color moving very fast but it was silent. i wasn't able to judge the distance or size of the object. we were pretty startled. i have seen meteor showers, but nothing ever like this. meteors i have seen before were very small visible for a split second. it didn't appear to be moving as fast as the meteors i have seen before, but it was moving very fast, and it was clearly visible for about 5-8 seconds before it went past the horizon. http:\\forums.uforesearcher.com\cgi-bin\ultimatebb.cgi?ubb=get_topic;f=3;t=000185
